data.title: Fix JSB cc.EaseBounce undefined
data.body: Change EaseBounce to real class instead of typedef. If this still isn't correct then I'll add a full EaseBounce class decl/definition.

data.title: fixed #16547: [ios, mac] Protencial memory leak in AudioPlayer.mm.
data.body:
If playing a large audio and its loop flag is set to false, after the audio is played over, there will be 4 or 8 bytes memory leak by _rotateBufferThread variable.

Resolution:

The `isDestroy` flag should not be set to true in rotate buffer thread, to exiting the thread, we need another varible for this purpose.

Thanks @nicolechen819 for the feedback.

data.title: how to prevent frame half drop (60 -> 30)
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.12
- devices test on: iPhone6, iPhone4, iPhone4s, etc...
- developing environments
  - NDK version: none
  - Xcode version: 7.3.1
  - VS version: none
  - brower type and version: none

Steps to Reproduce:
1. make high cpu load
2. frame drops to 30 during about 5 seconds.

---

Hi, when I test my game, There's some section which uses 90% ~ 100% of cpu because of loading process. after that peak, fps drops from 60 into 30 and last during about 5 seconds. but there's no cpu load after loading process. how to prevent this drop?

data.title: cocos2d-js uiRichText.initWithXML not accept 1 argument anymore
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:3.13
- devices test on: windows 8.1, project win32
- developing environments
  - VS version: 2015

Steps to Reproduce:
1. test js-test in cocos2d-x-3.13\tests\js-tests\project\proj.win32
2. test with "UI Test/UIRichTech"

it produces error
and log in console

> JS: C:/Cocos/cocos2d-x-3.13/tests/js-tests/project/proj.win32/Debug.win32/src/GUITest/UIRichTextTest/UIRichTextTest.js:605:Error: js_cocos2dx_ui_RichText_initWithXML : wrong number of arguments: 1, was expecting 2

data.title: Memory leak in AudioPlayer.mm
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:3.13

If set _isDestroyed = true in rotateBufferThread function, then AudioPlayer::destroy() will return at the beginning. Which will cause memory leak.

data.title: Will crash if playing audio on Android 2.3.x

milestone.description: fix bugs are critical in v3.13

data.body: It is because `SimpleAudioEngine` or `new AudioEngine` uses `popen` to get some system property, and it will crash on Android 2.3.x.

data.title: schedule::update dt  is not accurate
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:3.9
- devices test on:android huawei

when fps is low than 60, the dt is 0.016, in fact it maybe 0.02 or more

```
self.nScheduleID = schedule:scheduleScriptFunc(function(dt)
            self:onTick(dt)
    end, 1/60, false)
```

data.title: Spine: PolygonBatch flush cause crash
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.3
- devices test on: iphone6s plus
- developing environments
  - NDK version:
  - Xcode version: 7/8
  - VS version:
  - brower type and version:

Steps to Reproduce:
1. upgrade ios to ios10 beta7, app may crash when we use spine

i think there is a problem in function PolygonBatch::flush:

```
GL::bindVAO(0);
glEnableVertexAttribArray(GLProgram::VERTEX_ATTRIB_POSITION);
glEnableVertexAttribArray(GLProgram::VERTEX_ATTRIB_COLOR);
glEnableVertexAttribArray(GLProgram::VERTEX_ATTRIB_TEX_COORDS);
```

it should be replace by:

 GL::enableVertexAttribs(GL::VERTEX_ATTRIB_FLAG_POSITION | GL::VERTEX_ATTRIB_FLAG_COLOR | GL::VERTEX_ATTRIB_FLAG_TEX_COORD);

otherwise, the s_attributeFlags in GL:enableVertexAttribs will dismatch the real state

data.title: v3.13.1 updated winrt libcocos2d dll version to 3.13.1

data.title: getSlidBallRenderer methods to allow more customization of UISlider
setAnimationInterval bug in win32
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.11.1
- devices test on: win32  (4-devices)
  
  case 1 :
  `director->setAnimationInterval(1.0 / 60);`  the game frame will be - between 61 and 57, and there is lag in the game -on some devices it will run  between 60 and 59.
  case 2:
  `director->setAnimationInterval(1.0 / 61.5);`  the game frame will be - between 60 and 59, runs perfect (same device that got lag on 1.0/60 the lag will be solved on this devices) ,and will run between 61.5 and 60 on some devices .

So for me to solve the lag on some devices i run the game at 61.5 fps to get 60 fps ,but it will run 61.5 on other devices .

data.title: Support for compiling more OpenGL ES shaders on desktop platforms also.
data.body: Support compiling OpenGL ES shaders that use lowp, mediump or highp on desktop platforms also. These symbols are not defined on desktop platforms so the code defines these symbols.
